starfield-blueprints.title: Starfield Blueprints
starfield-blueprints.desc: Website where users can create and share ship blueprints from the game Starfield.

star-rail-warp-sim.title: Star Rail Warp Sim
star-rail-warp-sim.desc: Recreates many features from the game Honkai Star Rail. Features internationalization for 12 langauges.

ros.title: Restaurant Ordering System
ros.desc: A restuarant ordering system that allows customers to view a menu from a restaurant and create orders. Also allows staff to view and manange orders, as well as create and delete menu items and categories.

music.title: Heardle Unlimited
music.desc: Heardle, but unlimited attempts on a track pool of your choice using Spotify Premium. Features full track playback and also works with local files. Currently need to have your Spotify account whitelisted to use the Spotify integration.

filter.title: Kernal Image Processor
filter.desc: Uses a kernel (convolution matrix) to perform simple image processing on PPM images. Includes other options from a 'failed' implementation. Originally implemented in C and ported to the web.
